about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Quicktouch Technologies Limited is an information technology company. The company is in the business of Software IT Solution and Consulting Services, IT Product/Software Development and Software Commercial Training, and Web designing.

Quicktouch Technologies Limited's Web designing services include: Website Designing/ Redesigning, iOS App/ Android/ Mobile App Development, Digital Marketing, and Web Hosting Services.

The company is engaged in the business of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP). Quicktouch Technologies Limited help businesses to perform and excel in their operations by leveraging industry-wide experience, deep technology expertise, comprehensive services portfolio backed by a robust business model.

With years of domain expertise, processes, and infrastructure, the entity is diversifying its services offering to cater to various business sectors.

contactDetails.full_address: Quicktouch Technologies Limited, 815 Aggarwal Cyber Plaza-1, Netaji Subhash Place Pitampura, Delhi-110034

faqs.question: What is the Quicktouch Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Quicktouch Technologies IPO is a SME IPO of 1530000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹9.33 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹61 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on April 18, 2023, and closes on April 21, 2023.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Quicktouch Technologies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Quicktouch Technologies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Quicktouch Technologies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Quicktouch Technologies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Quicktouch Technologies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Quicktouch Technologies IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Quicktouch Technologies IPO opens on April 18, 2023 and closes on April 21, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Quicktouch Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: Quicktouch Technologies IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,22,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Quicktouch Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Quicktouch Technologies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Quicktouch Technologies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Quicktouch Technologies IPO will be done on Wednesday, April 26, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, April 28, 2023. Check the Quicktouch Technologies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Quicktouch Technologies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Quicktouch Technologies IPO listing date is on Tuesday, May 2, 2023.
